            public int detect()
            Returns whether there is an object within range of the ultrasonic sensors and where
            Obstacle CodeWooden Block
            0No obstacle detected
            1Obstacle to the left
            2Obstacle straight ahead
            3Obstacle to the right
            Returns:
            the obstacle code
